description: Simulated optimized module due to environment constraints. The optimization process would typically generate few-shot examples for the NLtoSQL module.

demos.question: Total revenue from the 'Beverages' category during 'Summer Beverages 1997' dates.
demos.constraints: Date range: 1997-06-01 to 1997-06-30. Category: Beverages. Revenue formula: SUM(UnitPrice*Quantity*(1-Discount)).
demos.sql_query: SELECT SUM(T2.UnitPrice * T2.Quantity * (1 - T2.Discount)) FROM Orders AS T1 INNER JOIN 'Order Details' AS T2 ON T1.OrderID = T2.OrderID INNER JOIN Products AS T3 ON T2.ProductID = T3.ProductID INNER JOIN Categories AS T4 ON T3.CategoryID = T4.CategoryID WHERE T4.CategoryName = 'Beverages' AND T1.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-06-01' AND '1997-06-30';

demos.question: Top 3 products by total revenue all-time.
demos.sql_query: SELECT T1.ProductName, SUM(T2.UnitPrice * T2.Quantity * (1 - T2.Discount)) AS Revenue FROM Products AS T1 INNER JOIN 'Order Details' AS T2 ON T1.ProductID = T2.ProductID GROUP BY T1.ProductName ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 3;
